name: andee
description: Andee - Telegram Bot powered by Claude Code Agent SDK

scripts.test: concurrently -n sandbox,telegram -c blue,magenta "npm run test:sandbox" "npm run test:telegram"
scripts.test:seq: npm run test:sandbox && npm run test:telegram
scripts.test:ci: concurrently -n sandbox,telegram -c blue,magenta "npm run test:sandbox -- --reporter=verbose" "npm run test:telegram -- --reporter=verbose"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix claude-sandbox-worker && npm run test:coverage --prefix claude-telegram-bot
scripts.typecheck: concurrently -n sandbox,telegram -c blue,magenta "npm run typecheck:sandbox" "npm run typecheck:telegram"
